recipesJson.name: Gush
recipesJson.author: NotCharlesManson
recipesJson.description: Gush clone. No subs can be made or it throws off the entire balance. Increase sweetener to 3% for authenticity. Age 1-3 days.

reviews.text: Never tried the original liquid, so I can only judge based on the recipe, itself. I have tried Gushers candy, however. By nature this is a sweet, candy-style profile, and it is spot on Gushers. Matt's recipes never disappoint. The FW Shirley Temple is definitely the key ingredient here. Very strong, in-your-face flavor, and perhaps a bit too much for ADV territory. Nevertheless, Gush is terrific as an occasional treat. Glad I picked up the flavors for this one. Very tasty. It is quite hard to put it down.
